foods.name: Quinoa Salad with Avocado
serving_suggestions: Serve chilled, optionally garnish with extra lemon zest.
Pair with a side of whole grain bread.

steps: Rinse quinoa under cold water and cook according to package instructions. Let it cool.
In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, diced avocado, cherry tomatoes, and cucumber.
Drizzle olive oil and lemon juice over the salad.
Season with salt and pepper, and toss everything together gently.
Garnish with fresh basil before serving.

foods.name: Vegan Lentil Soup
serving_suggestions: Serve with a slice of whole grain bread.
Top with fresh parsley and a drizzle of olive oil.

steps: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add chopped onion, carrot, celery, and minced garlic. Saut√© until vegetables are soft.
Add tomato paste, cumin, and stir to combine. Cook for another minute.
Add lentils, vegetable broth, and bay leaf. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until lentils are tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Remove the bay leaf and serve hot.
